title: Spear Phishing
content: Highly targeted scams using your job title, projects, or social media info to appear real.

title: Business Email Compromise (BEC)
content: Impersonates executives or vendors to push urgent payments or data requests.

title: Domain & URL Tricks
content: Lookalike domains (paypa1.com) and redirect links hide malicious sites.

title: Smishing & Vishing
content: Phishing by SMS or phone; common with fake delivery notices and bank alerts.

title: Defense-in-Depth
content: MFA, least privilege, email filters, and user training cut phishing risk drastically.
